meanings.definition: A group of drugs used to treat certain mental/mood disorders.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed thioridazines to help patients with mood problems.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on thioridazines to treat mental disorders.
meanings.sent3: The thioridazines danced in the medicine cabinet, ready to calm troubled minds.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled like thioridazines, bringing peace to her chaotic mind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pills of thioridazines were like tiny mood superheroes.

meanings.definition: The plural form of thioridazine, a type of medication.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy had a sale on thioridazines, offering discounts on the medication.
meanings.sent2: Many patients relied on thioridazines to manage their health conditions.
meanings.sent3: The thioridazines on the shelf chatted about their healing powers.
meanings.sent4: In the cabinet, the thioridazines stood united, ready to aid those in need.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of thioridazines gleamed, promising relief to those who took them.
